name: The Twinky Effect
description: The Twinky Effect is based on my childhood frog friend Twinky. He was a toad that lived outside my house. Twinky is a powerful wizard whose experiment goes wrong. All the magic orbs used in his experiment spread across the kingdom and turned inanimate objects into monsters. In between every level, there is a storybook cutscene.  There are four levels and this game is kid-friendly! This game was made in a class I took while in college but I thought it was good enough to post!
